title: Apple sues to terminate flagship store in Canada amid missed deadlines￼
content:
Just last month, Apple threatened to pull out of the planned development for its flagship retail store in downtown Toronto. The 85-story building called, “The One,” is under construction and in development by Sam Mizrahi. Now, the tech giant is suing the developer in order to terminate its lease. Apple said it is “disappointed” in Mizrahi Developments and is owed $6.9 million in damages for missed deadlines. 

more…

The post Apple sues to terminate flagship store in Canada amid missed deadlines￼ appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is suing Mizrahi Developments over missed deadlines regarding its flagship store under construction in Toronto, Canada.
